title: (Optional) Install containerized UD/UCMDB (AKS)
content:
The Native SACM and SAM solutions require a CMS system to work with the suite. Once you have completed the suite installation, you can continue to install UD/UCMDB on the same OMT cluster as the next deployment (the suite is the first deployment).

 

This task is optional. If you plan to use classic CMS, skip this step and follow the classic CMS documentation instead.

Install the containerized CMS

Perform the following steps to install the containerized CMS:

Topic Description
Plan Review the required resources and create a deployment plan for the installation of CMS with AKS:
  1. Review support matrix
  2. Review sizing considerations
Prepare and deploy Prepare the required resources for the installation of CMS with AKS:
  1. Download CMS charts package (AKS)
  2. Download and upload images for CMS (AKS)
  3. Launch AKS cluster worker nodes for CMS
  4. Create a new deployment for CMS (AKS)
  5. Subscribe premium Azure Files for CMS
  6. Prepare external databases for CMS (AKS)
  7. Create CMS integration admin user in SMAX IdM (AKS)
  8. Create my-values.yaml (AKS)
  9. Generate vault secrets (AKS)
  10. Install CMS on Azure
  11. Configure the application gateway for CMS
  12. Associate CMS SuperAdmin role (AKS)
Uninstall Uninstall UD/UCMDB on AWS with AKS

 

  • You must install UD/UCMDB on the same OMT on which SMA is installed.
  • For this release, you must use separate PostgreSQL databases and storage service instances for SMAX and containerized CMS.
